The following instructions have been found to work for Debian 7.2 Wheezy 64-bit.

1. Install all the necessary prerequisites (either as root or if you have set up sudo permissions by running visudo as root):  
     
   apt-get install subversion build-essential autoconf libnetcdf-dev libxml2-dev libproj-dev
2. Run subversion:  
     
   mkdir ~/AtlantisBuild  
   cd AtlantisBuild  
   svn co <https://svnserv.csiro.au/svn/ext/atlantis/Atlantis/trunk/atlantis>
3. Compile and build:  
     
   cd atlantis  
   aclocal  
   autoheader  
   autoconf  
   automake -a  
   ./configure  
   make  
   sudo make install
4. Test Atlantis:  
     
   atlantisMerged -v
